name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Sr. Incident Response Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering comprehensive incident response solutions. Specialized in incident management and security protocols, with proficiency in **Microsoft Windows Server**, **Microsoft Exchange**, **Microsoft SQL Server**, **Active Directory**, **SCCM**, **VMware**, and **Microsoft Hyper-V**. Deep knowledge of **backup and disaster recovery solutions**, **VPN**, and **Citrix**, ensuring system integrity and rapid recovery in critical situations.

Expert in utilizing **Azure** and **AWS** services to bolster infrastructure reliability and security, while ensuring compliance with industry regulations. Proven track record in project planning and delivery, with a focus on implementing effective **security solutions**, including **MFA** and **endpoint protection**. Adept at navigating complex networking concepts, including **IPsec tunnels** and **Dynamic VPN**, to enhance organizational resilience.

Brings a holistic approach to IT security, blending technical expertise with strategic thinking to address real-world challenges and drive impact across various sectors.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Performed incident response and mitigation strategies, ensuring compliance with security solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, leveraging skills in **Active Directory** and **Microsoft Exchange** to secure and manage user access.
•	Configured and managed **Microsoft SQL Server** for critical database storage and retrieval, ensuring optimal performance and advanced security measures to protect sensitive data.
•	Conducted thorough investigations and implemented effective **disaster recovery solutions**, utilizing **Microsoft Windows Server** and **VMware** for system restoration and backup verification.
•	Managed **SCCM** and **MDT** for deploying and updating software across multiple sites, enhancing operational efficiency and minimizing downtime during project delivery.
•	Designed and implemented **Dynamic VPN** and **IPsec tunnels** solutions to secure remote access for users, ensuring secure connectivity and endpoint protection against potential threats.
•	Developed project planning and management strategies for enhancing incident response workflows, delivering on-time results through **ServiceNow** ticketing and tracking.
•	Integrated **Citrix** environments for remote desktop access, improving accessibility and user experience in a secure manner for various applications.
•	Executed network monitoring and optimization tasks using **Cisco CCNA** and **CCNP** skill sets, maintaining network integrity and performance across critical environments.
•	Implemented multi-factor authentication (MFA) across systems to enhance security posture, protecting against unauthorized access and data breaches.
•	Utilized **NetApp** storage solutions to ensure high availability and efficient data management across the organization, addressing storage area network (SAN) needs effectively.
•	Conducted training sessions on **Microsoft SharePoint** usage and best practices, improving collaboration among teams in incident response protocols.
